    server - package server
     
    Server - Class in server
    Main class that extends AbstractServer OCSF server class that handles client communication, interacts with the database controller, and updates the JavaFX GUI via ServerUI.
    Server(int, ServerFrameController) - Constructor for class server.Server
    Constructs a new Server instance with the specified port and UI.
    ServerFrameController - Class in serverGUI
    JavaFX controller for the server configuration and monitoring GUI.
    ServerFrameController() - Constructor for class serverGUI.ServerFrameController
     
    serverGUI - package serverGUI
     
    ServerMain_Gui - Class in serverGUI
    Main entry point for the server-side JavaFX graphical user interface.
    ServerMain_Gui() - Constructor for class serverGUI.ServerMain_Gui
     
    ServerUI - Interface in server
    Interface for sending messages and client connection updates to the server GUI.
    setDatabaseConfig(String, String, String) - Method in class server.Server
    Configures the database connection parameters.
    setServer(Server) - Method in class serverGUI.ServerFrameController
    Sets the server instance for this controller.
    setStatus(String) - Method in class server.ClientStatusInfo
    Updates the client's connection status.
    start(Stage) - Method in class serverGUI.ServerMain_Gui
    Initializes and displays the server control panel window.
    statusProperty() - Method in class server.ClientStatusInfo
    Returns the observable property for the client connection status.
